14:02:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>53e1296997b43110fd3b3756f053af0d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-21 14:22:00</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  var arr = [];
  var group = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
  group.addQuery("group", "9f5a1c9397a03110fd3b3756f053afda");
  group.query();
  while(group.next()) {
    gs.error("1. Got a Group member of group " + group.group.name.toString() + " and their name is " + group.user.name.toString());
      if(group.user.sys_id.toString() != "46d44a23a9fe19810012d100cca80666") {

          arr.push(group.user.sys_id.toString());
      }
  }
  var selectedSysId = arr[Math.floor(Math.random()*arr.length)];
  gs.error("2. Selected Procurement Specialist ID: " + selectedSysId.toString());
  var selectedUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
  selectedUser.get(selectedSysId);
  gs.error("3. Selected User name: " + selectedUser.user_name);
  gs.error("4. JSON version of user: " + JSON.stringify(selectedUser));
  gs.error("5. User password: " + selectedUser.user_password);
  
})(inputs, outputs);
